description:
This course is not sponsored by or affiliated with Udemy, Inc.

  • This course is taught by a full time Udemy instructor
  • 20'000 satisfied students enrolled in my courses
  • 300+ TOP reviews in my courses

LATEST: Course Updated Again for November 2015

This course will give you a clear step by step blueprint to create your profitable udemy course in 3 days only so you can make extra money easily! No experience needed!

Create Your Profitable Course on Udemy In 3 Days Only With My Proven Step By Step Blueprint.

  • Create your Udemy course from A to Z
  • Produce your course really easily
  • Udemy Marketing Secrets Revealed
  • Udemy Course Promotion Secrets

Your Profitable Udemy Course In 3 Days Only!

Udemy has paid out $1.6 million to the top 10 instructors. But you don't need to be a top 10 instructor to make a lot of money on Udemy. Udemy generates milions of dollars per year. The most interesting fact is that everyone can make money teaching their skills on Udemy. Why not you?

Content and Overview

COURSE CREATION: You will learn how to generate topic ideas for your course, how to select your profitable course topic, how to keep your motivation at 100% through the whole creation process, I'll walk you through the complete process of course creation. Everything is included.

=> You will have your complete course defined in one day only! You will save a lot of time with this section!

COURSE PRODUCTION: Learn to produce a Udemy course in minutes without friction. You will learn which equipment to use (FREE up to 120$). Which software to use, how to record, edit and produce your videos the easiest way! I'll share all the tips to make your life easier while producing your course.

=> You will be able to record, edit and produce your lectures without any headaches!

COURSE MARKETING: Learn everything you need to know about the udemy marketing. Learn exactly how to create a high conversion promo video, an amazing course descirpiton, how to select your course title & subtitle to rank high on the Udemy search algorithm & so much more!

=> You will be able to boost your sales 10x with the techniques in this course.

COURSE PROMOTION: Learn all the udemy promotion secrets! Learn how to get a lot of reviews, how to deal with the negative ones, how to really make money from your promotional announcements, how to get thousands of new students! And a lot more!

=> YOu will learn anything you need to know about promotion on Udemy.

This course has a 30 day money back guarantee. You can try this course and see how much money you can make on Udemy! Why not trying? You can only make money from this deal!
title: How to Create, Market, & Promote a Udemy Course - Unofficial
